title: Bug 20831[MPE] MultiPageEditorPart.setActivePage() doesn't send pageChange()
description: Build F3I'm not sure if this is by design or not, but when you send setActivePage() toa MultiPageEditorPart, it does not invoke its pageChange() method. This methodis often overridden by subclasses to provide additional behavior on pagechanges.If this is, in fact, the desired behaviour, it should probably be documentedin setActivePage().
